thread.title: BRIEF-Assured Guaranty Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.44

title: BRIEF-Assured Guaranty Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.44
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Assured Guaranty Ltd:
* Assured Guaranty Ltd. REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER 2017 AND FULL YEAR 2017
* Q4 NON-GAAP OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.77
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44 * CO RECOGNIZED PROVISIONAL TAX EXPENSE OF $61 MILLION ATTRIBUTABLE TO ESTIMATED EFFECT OF TAX REFORM
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $281 MILLION VERSUS $470 MILLION * ‍SETTLEMENT REACHED IN Q4 REGARDING BREACH OF REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES CLAIM, RESULTING IN PRETAX GAIN OF $105 MILLION​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.66 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY NET EARNED PREMIUMS $178 MILLION VERSUS $236 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
